Porting notes
2022-07-05
-------------

Use vcpkg as Toolchain file, required for boost

The following defines must be set unchecked before compiling
BUILD_EXAMPLES
BUILD_TESTING
BUILD_TEST_FRAMEWORK

ENABLE_ECL_OUTPUT
ENABLE_MOCKSIM

This porting was based on commit 1516b63a3906b4474cac37253d435b46d37513b7 from opm-common
